page.shortlink: api objects session object has variable method
page.description: Checks whether the session-state has a variable or not.

argument.name: Key as C
argument.description: The key of the session-state variable.

page.discussion: Context.Session.HasVariable() checks if the session-state contains a variable. A session variable may have been set, but be empty. If this method returns .F. a session variable with that key has never been set.

section.example:
<%a5
  dim cookieDisclaimerResponse as c = "AcceptAll"
  dim showCookieDisclaimer as L = .t.
  if Context.Session.HasVariable("CookieDisclaimerResponse" then
      cookieDisclaimerResponse = Context.Session.Variables.CookieDisclaimerResponse
	  showCookieDisclaimer = .f.
  end if
%>
